title: Ticket #5179: condor_who -daemon -log asserts
description:
submit-3:~/condor/test$ condor_who -daemon -log /home/tlmiller/condor/obj/tmp/unit_test_sinful.saveme/pdir3864/pdir3864ccbAndSp/log

ERROR "Assertion ERROR on (fd >= 0)" at line 330 in file /home/tlmiller/condor/source/src/condor_io/condor_rw.cpp

This appears to be caused by not checking for errors in condor_who/who.cpp, get_daemon_param(), especially from sock.connect() and dae.startCommand().

This is probably specific to the wacky configuration of the personal condor in question.
